title: Interpretation of seeing a marriage paper in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a marriage contract paper in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the decision to marry is one of the important and decisive decisions that a person makes in his life, and it changes and affects him a lot. This limit is marriage, but the matter becomes more ambiguous if a married or already pregnant girl sees it, and in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a marriage contract paper in a dream according to its interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing books in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says: If a young man dreams that he is writing to a girl he does not know and whose appearance he does not know, this indicates the death of that person. He has many interests, but he will not reach them, but whoever sees that he is writing to a girl from his mahrams, this indicates that this person will have an excellent status among his family and friends. But if a young man dreams that he will marry a Jew, this means that that person will commit sins in his life. , but if she is a Christian, it means that that person will fall into temptation. And longing for love. That person’s religion or his committing many major sins. But if a man dreams that he is marrying a girl who has great status, influence, and power, this means that this person will commit many things that will land him in prison, but if he sees that there is a girl coming to him and he wants to marry and get married, then this It indicates that he will receive a lot of goodness without asking for it. But if he sees that he is in a place and there is a person with a marriage certificate, it means that he will get a new job or career. . The person may be imprisoned. However, if a person dreams that his son is marrying an influential woman and that his son is a man of great status, this indicates that this person will obtain a lot of money and change the state of poverty into wealth, but if he sees that he is marrying one of his mahrams, and this person If he hates her qualities, this indicates that he will cut off his mercy on this woman, but if he sees that she will marry without his consent, this indicates imposing a lot. Things that he does not want on him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a marriage paper in a dream for a woman. Ibn Shirin says: If a girl dreams that she is marrying someone she knows who is not her mahram, this means that she will fall into a great misfortune, but if she dances and sings in the books of the book, this means that she will reveal her romantic relationship and reveal her cover. To the world, but if she saw that she was marrying a young man she did not know, she would be very happy with this marriage. This indicates her kindness, happiness, and marriage if she is single, but if she is married, this indicates that there is love and tenderness between her and her husband, or good news that she will become pregnant. But if the girl sees that she will marry a dead woman, this indicates her desire to do something, but this will not happen, but If she sees that she will marry someone she knows and loves in reality and wants to get closer to him. for him. She was happy and dancing, which means that she will not marry this person. If she sees that she is marrying one of her mahrams, this indicates that God will provide her with sufficient sustenance soon. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a marriage paper in a dream: As for seeing a marriage paper in a pregnant woman’s dream, it indicates her misfortune or that she will suffer from a serious illness and difficulty in giving birth if the person who She married him in a dream to one of her acquaintances.

title: Interpretation of seeing God talking to me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing God speaking to me in a dream, via the website roy2a.com. Seeing God in a dream indicates the strength of religion, faith, and integrity in God’s commandments, and God’s words from behind the veil mean judgment, authority, and high status, and God’s words without a veil mean failures in worship and commitment. Disobedience, and we will explain that in this article. Interpretation of seeing God speaking to me in dreams for single girls, married women, pregnant women, men, single young men, divorcees, and widows, and providing interpretations of major imams in interpreting dreams and visions, such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Katheer, al-Nabulsi, and other translators, past and present. Follow us on the Vision website. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing God speaking to me in a dream? Seeing God in a dream indicates righteousness and piety. Seeing someone speaking with God in a dream declares repentance from sins, avoiding evil, and being upright in God’s commandments. Seeing the word of God behind the veil indicates that the dreamer has achieved an important position and that Seeing the ruler shows the strength of his rule, justice, and love for his subjects, and the vision shows the strength of religion and faith. Whoever sees that God promised him forgiveness and mercy, it indicates God’s forgiveness, mercy, and true vision. I see myself looking at the throne of God in a dream. It indicates very good food, a blessing with money, and a good ending. See also Interpretation of seeing the Word of God in a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing God speaking to me in a dream with an unmarried woman? If a girl sees that God is speaking to her in a dream, it indicates pride, victory, and forgiveness. Seeing the Word of God behind the veil in a dream indicates the strength of religion for the girl, cover and luxury. A vision of worshiping God and God’s words during worship in a dream for one girl indicates the power of religion, prestige, and pride. What is the interpretation of seeing God speaking to me in a dream about a married woman? If a married woman sees God speaking to her in a dream, it indicates her pride, high status, and the strength of her faith. If a married woman sees God speaking to her in a dream without a veil, it indicates her failure to worship with God and committing a sin. Seeing the word of God behind the veil in a dream for a married woman indicates an increase in money, blessings, prestige, and stability in her married life. See also: Interpretation of seeing the words of Muhammad, the Messenger of God In Paradise in a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing God speaking to me in a dream about a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees God speaking to her from behind the veil in a dream, the birth of a girl indicates ease of birth, ease, and high status. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is listening to God, this portends a lot of goodness. In her life and death, pain and problems. What is the interpretation of seeing God speaking to me in a divorced woman’s dream? If a divorced woman sees God in a dream, it announces a lot of goodness in her life, avoiding sins and transgressions. Seeing the word of God behind the veil in a divorced woman’s dream indicates raising one’s status and assuming power. A leadership position, as it indicates piety and faith. What is the interpretation of seeing a monologue with God? Seeing a monologue with God in a dream announces people’s love for him, concealment from God, and a lot of goodness for the dreamer. Seeing God’s monologue

title: Interpretation of losing a child in a dream

preview.html: We offer you an interpretation of losing a child in a dream in different circumstances, and losing a child makes his family live in a state of tension and stress and they try to search for him everywhere to find him. Interpretations suggested by scholars to interpret dreams about it. Interpretation of losing a child in a dream Symbol of losing a child in a dream Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a lost child in a dream and finding him is good news for the mother, contrary to what his appearance suggests. It is possible that seeing a lost boy in a dream is a reflection of what a person feels in his life of nostalgia for the past and for himself when he was a young child, and these feelings were reflected in the details of his dream. Finding a lost child in a dream is one of the things that portend good, as the dreamer will find the thing he lost after a long search and toil in vain. Losing a child in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream that her child has been lost to her, this is one of the unfavorable things because it symbolizes that there will be problems and disputes between her and her husband, well much more. If a married woman sees that her son is missing from her, and then finds him dead, this means the death of one of her relatives, who will grieve over their death. He pointed out that the interpretation of a woman’s vision of losing her child is just a dream and a reflection of what this woman feels of constant anxiety and extreme fear for her children and that it is not an indication of anything either. It is good or bad. If she sees in her dream that a child is missing, and she knows this child, but he is not her son, then this dream symbolizes the presence of some people who interfere in her life and cause problems between her and her husband. And the vision of a married woman of a lost child but she does not know that child, is a symbol that this woman expressed a certain desire and did her best to achieve it, but she will not be able to achieve that desire or reach this goal. And the fatigue that he was doing was of no use. Interpretation of seeing a lost child in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees that the child she knows was with her in her dream and then disappeared from her, then this dream is one of the unpleasant things that she sees in her visions, as it indicates that this girl will fall into a big problem or a problem that will cause her many problems in her life, and if she sees that she was able to find this child, then this is good news that these worries and problems will end, God willing. And if she sees in her dream a child she does not know and the child is lost, then this dream symbolizes the anxiety and confusion that this girl feels about her life, as well as the sadness she lives due to her constant thinking. For the opportunities that he missed and did not take advantage of them properly. As for seeing the girl as her child, this dream is also unpleasant, as it indicates that she will fall into a big problem or illness that will affect her. Interpretation of a dream about finding a lost child Whoever sees in a dream that he found a lost child, this dream is one of the most promising visions for the fortune teller, because it symbolizes the death of the problems and disputes that a person falls into. It can also indicate the fulfillment of desires that he worked to achieve and put effort and time into, but he did not see the result and his fatigue. To interpret another dream, you can use the application

Interpretation of the dream of finding a lost child: Whoever sees in a dream that he has found a lost child, then this dream is one of the most Promising visions for the fortuneteller, because it symbolizes the death of problems and disagreements in which a person falls. It can also indicate the satisfaction of desires that he worked to achieve and put effort and time into, but he did not see the result and exhausted himself. title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a tooth in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The molar is the tool used for cutting food and chewing and helps the teeth in the human jaw and molars from being exposed to any damage that causes health problems. Disorder and fatigue that cause a lot of anxiety and discomfort, if seeing it in a dream is a source of concern for the fortuneteller, so we will explain in detail the interpretation of a dream about a tooth for a man or a woman, whether he is married or single. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth by Ibn Sirini. A falling tooth in a dream indicates some frozen desires, and these desires may be Sexual or psychological. A tooth falling out in a dream can also indicate the dreamer’s anxiety. Seeing a tooth decaying in a dream is evidence of infection. If one sees in a dream that moths have butterflies and treat them with a doctor, this is an indication that anxiety has disappeared. Seeing a damaged tooth in A dream is a sign of misfortunes. Seeing a damaged molar in a dream is a sign that problems will arise and will be eliminated soon. Seeing upper molars falling out is a sign of a lot of money. Molars falling out is a sign of enemies. A molar falling out in a dream for poor people is a sign of wealth. And the money that will be achieved soon. Molars falling out on the lower jaw indicate difficulties and problems. Seeing the molars being cleaned using the advantage is an indication of the differences that will arise between the parents. Scientists consider only evidence of the benefit that the fortuneteller received from one of his relatives. Seeing all the molars falling out is evidence of death All parents.Interpretation of a dream about the fall of the upper molar. Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees that his upper teeth fall out in his hand, then it is money, and if it falls in his lap, then it is a boy, and if it falls on the ground, then it is a disaster.Interpretation of the dream about the fall of the lower molar. Whoever sees the fall of the lower molar, suffers from pain and delusion. And whoever has teeth falling out in a dream, this indicates that he will pay off his debt. If he sees that a tooth has fallen out, he will pay all his debts at once, and if all his teeth fall out, everyone in that house and friends will die. Interpretation of a tooth in a dream A tooth in a dream represents people from the dream’s large families and the best family members or people who are a pleasure to be around. The molars in the upper part of the mouth indicate male relatives, while the molars in the lower jaw indicate female relatives. For a married woman, a molar falling out in a dream means that there are problems and obstacles that prevent her from achieving it, and if the molar falls on her hand, it means that she will become pregnant, If she has children, this indicates a great fear of making mistakes. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth for a married woman. If a married woman sees a tooth falling out of her mouth, this indicates that she will soon give birth. A tooth falling out in a married woman’s dream can indicate money, kindness, and blessings. If a woman sees A married woman believes that all her white teeth are a sign of goodness and happiness, and she will feel them in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth for a pregnant woman: Seeing a tooth for a pregnant woman is evidence that a child will be born. Toothache in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of ease of childbirth and relief from the stress of pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth for a man: saw a

title: Interpretation of a dream about honey for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing honey in a dream for an unmarried girl in a honeycomb. Eating white or black honey or beeswax in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Usaimi, and the interpretation of honey for a married and pregnant woman and for pregnant women. A man also: Honey in a dream is one of the very beautiful and enjoyable dreams that we still see in dreams, as honey is one of the very beneficial things for the body that provides it with energy, vitality and other benefits, and in fact, consuming honey is of great importance in building a man’s body, which is what we asked for. Review for you today. Interpretation of honey in a dream for a girl. Honey in a dream is evidence of recovery from diseases. Honey: the fear of God and the dreamer’s obedience to Him, as it is the drink of Paradise. Seeing honey in an unmarried woman’s dream is good news for any unmarried girl, and seeing honey indicates the groom and marriage, If she eats it with bread, she will get married that year, and her marriage to people will be blessed and good. Offspring. If an unmarried woman sees that she is buying honey from the market, she will benefit in this world, provided that she does not see in the dream that the honey seller is taking his price. It was also included in the interpretation: If a woman sees in her dream that she is tasting honey, then she will get married, and the good thing is that the girl finds the taste of honey delicious; Because this means happiness and contentment. Both worlds. It was also said: Buying honey in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates good reward, and honey is the best food for everyone, and Ibn Sirin considered buying honey to be clear good news. The great Imam Ibn Sirin, the interpreter of dreams in his interpretations, interpreted seeing honey in a dream in a number of ways. Important signs and signals that come to the dreamer and he must be aware of them. Interpretation of honey in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Seeing only honey in a dream is evidence that God will understand her in religion and she will become a scholar in religion. Seeing honey for an unmarried woman in a dream is a sign of... Goodness and happiness. A girl who sees honey in a dream is evidence of the calm and stability that comes to her after fatigue. Honey in a girl’s dream is evidence of the knowledge and culture that she will acquire in life. A girl who buys honey in a dream is evidence that she will get a lot of money from the amount of honey that she She buys it. A girl who sees black honey in a dream shows that she fears God in all her personal dealings and keeps His commandments. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that a young man gives her honey and knows it, this is evidence that he will marry her soon. To see a woman alone licking honey in a dream and it tastes delicious , evidence of God restoring her mind. Seeing a bee in a dream is a sign of a coming blessing. Interpretation of honey in a dream for an unmarried woman by Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing only honey in a dream is evidence that God will understand her in religion and she will become a scholar in religion. Seeing honey for an unmarried woman in a dream It is a sign of goodness and happiness. The girl who sees honey in a dream is evidence of the calm and stability that comes to her after fatigue. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that a young man gives her honey and knows it, this is evidence that he will marry her soon. To see a woman alone licking honey in a dream and it tastes delicious , evidence of God restoring her mind. Seeing a bee in a dream is a sign of a coming blessing. Interpretation of honey in a dream for an unmarried woman by Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing only honey in a dream is evidence that God will understand her in religion and she will become a scholar in religion. Seeing honey for an unmarried woman in a dream It is a sign of goodness and happiness. The girl who sees honey in a dream is evidence of the calm and stability that comes to her after fatigue. Honey in the girl’s dream is evidence of the knowledge and culture that she will acquire in life. The girl who buys honey in the

title: The dead kiss the living in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will learn together from our website translated the meanings and consequences of dreaming of the dead kissing the living in a dream, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing a dead person kissing a living person in a dream for one girl. A dead man’s kissing of an unmarried woman in a dream portends her well-being, success, and abundance of strength. Whoever sees In a dream, a dead person she knows kisses her on the cheeks, as she is happy with the benefits that she will receive through the dead person. Interpretation scholars say that kissing an unmarried woman in a dream with a dead person is a sign of her receiving her inheritance from the dead person. It is permissible for you to marry one of his family or children, or seek the help of someone His relatives and God knows best. If a girl kisses a dead person in her dream, he is also unknown to her. It is a sign that good things are coming to her and she may get married soon. But if she knows the dead person then she misses him and he misses her. If an unmarried woman sees her dead father kissing her in a dream, she may get married Soon. The dream may be a sign for her that her father needs charity for his soul and prayers for mercy and forgiveness for him. See also: Ibn Sirin’s detailed interpretation of seeing dead people in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a dead person kissing a living person in a dream for a married womanKissing the unknown dead person for a married woman in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is alive A calm and stable married life and enjoying the spaciousness of life. If the kiss is on her forehead, it is good that she will become pregnant soon. If the dreamer suffers from a bad financial condition for her husband and sees a dead person kissing her in a dream. It is evidence of the stability of the husband’s condition, the strength of his financial situation, his work, and his livelihood. Kissing a deceased parent in a dream is a sign of intense longing for them and a feeling of loneliness and loss after their death. Kissing a deceased relative in a married woman’s dream is evidence that the deceased provided her with a lot of support and services in his life. If a woman sees her dead husband kissing her in a dream, she needs... To confirmation and peace in her life, bringing them closer to God Almighty. This vision also expresses the death of worry and sadness and the alleviation of distress, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dead person kissing in a dream for a man and its meaning. Kissing an unknown dead person in a man’s dream is one of the promising visions of abundant sustenance. Increasing the fortuneteller’s money and overcoming difficulties. And the obstacles that he went through in the past period. If a man sees a dead person kissing him on the shoulder in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer has met a need. And to obtain some benefits in his work that will change his financial situation for the better, and God knows best. If the man gets sick and his health condition is unstable, then Kissing a dead person in a dream is a bad omen. He may become seriously ill and remain bedridden for a long time until his term expires, and God knows best. When a man sees one of his deceased friends kissing him in a dream, this means that the fortuneteller is constantly asking about the family of the dead and offering them help. And in the event that the deceased was a relative The dreamer may obtain an inheritance or benefit from him, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing a dead person kissing a living person in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Kissing a dead person in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates goodness, living, health and happiness, God willing. And if she sees an unknown dead person

title: What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about a traffic accident?

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about a car accident: Accidents are an unplanned event that occurs suddenly and a person may die or suffer treatable scratches. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident: Many interpreters believe that seeing a dreamer in a car accident in a dream indicates many fears and psychological pressures that will affect him. If the dreamer sees a car accident in a dream, this indicates disturbed feelings and extreme anxiety at that time. Also, the dreamer seeing a car accident in a dream means that there are many different decisions that he must take time to think about. The dreamer’s vision of a car accident indicates In a dream, it indicates the various problems and crises that he will face, and fear and constant atonement for the future. Seeing an accident in a dream means that the dreamer must be very careful in his life regarding some of his actions regarding the events that he is experiencing. If an employee dreams that he is in a traffic accident, this indicates that he will face many problems. In his work or that there is a conflict with his friends. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a car accident: Ibn Sirin says that if the dreamer sees a car accident and it overturns, this indicates that many things will happen that will change the course of his life. If the dreamer witnesses an accident and a car overturns and dies, this symbolizes that Things will improve in his life and his worries will be removed from him. Also, the occurrence of a car accident for the dreamer is evidence of his inability to face the problems and difficulties in his life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is sitting next to a person driving a car and it overturns with him, then this symbolizes the necessity of making decisions in his life. If I dreamed that someone you do not know was involved in a car accident, then this symbolizes the struggles that you will soon enter into. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for individuals: If a single girl sees in a dream a car accident, this indicates that there are problems with her lover and a major conflict will occur between them. And in the event that the fiancée sees In a dream that she was involved in a car accident, this will lead to the cancellation of her engagement and the emergence of many problems. When the dreamer sees the car upside down and causing severe fractures, this means that he makes quick decisions, which exposes him to problems. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a married womanIf a married woman sees in her dream a car accident This means that she thinks badly about some of the situations she is going through and is quick to make decisions. If one sees a normal car accident without injuries in a dream, it symbolizes excessive exhaustion and anxiety about a specific matter. The woman’s vision was that she was in a car accident but survived it, then It shows her soon relief and recovery from her misfortune. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a car accident in a dream, this indicates the extreme exhaustion she suffers from during pregnancy, but it will end soon, God willing. If the dreamer sees her surviving the accident in a dream, this symbolizes An easy birth and the fetus will be in good health. However, if the dreamer sees that he was involved in a car accident with serious fractures, then these are not good visions that indicate that the fetus is exposed to something harmful. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she was involved in a traffic accident

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating fish in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating fish: We often see that we eat fish in dreams, so many people wonder about the interpretation of a dream about eating fish, because it has many connotations and has been interpreted by many, such as Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin. Dreams are fantasies that a person sees and occur during sleep, and in psychology, These dreams are merely expressions of desires and impulses inherent in the soul, which are difficult to satisfy in the world of truth and reality, usually because they do not exist. It is logic, order, or continuity, so a different site offers you an interpretation of a dream about eating fish. Interpretation of eating fish in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi said in his book (Perfuming People in the Interpretation of Dreams): Fish in a dream indicates a woman if the number of fish is known, live fish, and fish. Tender means a woman, while eating fish in a dream. It means money and corruption. For those who dream that they caught a big fish and ate from it, this means the goodness that the dreamer will see in his life, and tender fish are good evidence for those who want to get married. As for whoever sees himself in bed and eating fish while traveling, he fears distress for himself. The interpretation of a dream about eating live fish or raw fish means achieving the king’s goal. If the number of fish in the dream reaches four, this means a good woman and a good life. Eating large quantities of fish or whale meat in a dream means corruption of money, and frying fish in oil means The students will respond, God willing. Grilling fish means eating while on the move or traveling. As for someone who is single and sees in his dream that he is buying fish, he will propose to a girl. Fish in the river or sea may indicate some hypocrisy or falsehood, and a small fish may show a little joy. A large fish or whale may show great joy. If the dreamer sees a grilled fish falling from the sky, this is a good sign that his prayers will be answered. Perhaps the dream indicates victory or success. This interpretation applies to both men and women, whether they are single, pregnant or married. Interpretation of eating fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book (Interpretation of Dreams) grilled salted fish as an indication of knowledge, as God Almighty said in Surah Al-Kahf: When they reached The combination of the two forgot their whale, so he made his own. Completely free. What is meant here is that the Prophet Moses, peace be upon him, and his companion took the spoils before meeting our master Al-Khidr, who was eating fresh grilled fish, which is good for the story of Jesus’ peace table. Bring it. Eating grilled fish in a dream means accepting an invitation, and grilled fish in a man’s dream indicates great goodness if the man is pious and indicates severe punishment if the man is not pious. If a woman sees that she is soaking a small fish in flour, she will get some money and spend it. With great interest. It was said in the interpretation: Fish deserve praise if they are grilled, except for small ones. Because it has more thorns than meat. Fish thorns in a dream indicate hostility or conflict between the dreamer and his family, and it is said that this is a hope or desire that the dreamer does not achieve except after hardship. Eating fish

title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole food in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you an interpretation of seeing whole maamoul in a dream, known as cake or known as cake, which is a type of oriental sweet with a beautiful taste filled with dates and nuts. The correct thing that you need to know about the complete interpretation of the vision of Al-Rasikh in a dream, as well as what is the interpretation of the vision of eating peanuts, and we also collected for you what is the interpretation of the vision of eating dates for the elderly, married and pregnant women, as well as for men, from the books of senior scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. The vision of Maamoul Whole in a dream: Seeing eating a lot of delicious sweets in a dream is considered whole as one of the praiseworthy visions and indicates great goodness and broad satisfaction that the dreamer will obtain. Dreaming of eating maamoul stuffed with dates indicates good news and improved conditions. Seeing the complete preparation of maamoul in a dream is evidence that the dreamer He will receive many great benefits and blessings, in addition to the fulfillment of his desires. Also, seeing what is happening in a dream that the dreamer cannot eat is undesirable and indicates anxiety, troubles, heartaches, and problems. Binge eating in a complete dream is a sign that the dreamer feels lonely and wants Changing his life, which is a sign of marriage to an ordinary man. What is the interpretation of seeing ordinary dates for an ordinary woman? Eating cake in a dream filled with an ordinary woman is one of the dreams that promises her that she will fulfill her desires and succeed in what she seeks in life. Also, seeing cakes in a dream that are completed For a girl, it is a sign of kindness and happiness and an indication that she will marry the right person for her. The interpretation of seeing what is happening in a dream in general about an ordinary woman and eating it is evidence of many useful things that she will obtain. Eating maamoul in a dream for a married woman. What is the interpretation of seeing eating food in a dream? Whole for a married woman, evidence of happiness and joy, stopping all her problems and saving her from sadness. Eating a whole cake in a dream for a married woman indicates that she and her family will receive a lot of food and good things in the near future. Preparing maamoul and then giving it to the husband, or vice versa in a woman’s dream, It is one of the good visions that have great importance for the upcoming pregnancy. Eating maamoul in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman greedily eating cakes in a dream is complete evidence that she will get rid of the pain of pregnancy and childbirth and her condition will improve. What is the interpretation of a dream about eating everything that is edible for a pregnant woman in general? It is good news and happiness and facilitates childbirth without problems. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself eating maamoul with pistachios? Eating whole peanuts in a dream is one of the desired visions that means that the dreamer will change a lot in his life for the better. Distributing whole maamoul in a dream. Seeing distributing whole maamoul in a dream is evidence On the many successes and good things that the dreamer will achieve in his coming days. Distributing maamoul in a dream is full of news of goodness, happiness and joys that will enter the dreamer’s home and is a sign of the approaching marriage. If you had a dream that you want
